The Atlantic Current: Mapping the Virgins of Guadalupe and Remedios

Rianxo, A Coruña, Galacia

Katherine Dau

Verified

Photo from Wikimedia Commons

The chapel was largely constructed in the 17th century. In 1671, Alonso Fernández de Bastón established the chapel on the site of an earlier shrine. The image of the Virgin of Guadalupe was installed in 1854.

The people of Rianxo celebrate the Virgin of Guadalupe from September 7-14 each year.

Photo from Wikimedia Commons
